alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Pender, central Bladen and northeastern Columbus Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Ammon to near Williams. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Elizabethtown, Rowan, Lake Waccamaw, Sandyfield, Penderlea, Point Caswell, Hallsboro, Redbug, Council, Williams, Currie, Wards Corner, Carvers, Lisbon, Lagoon, Elkton, Rooks, Emerson, and Kelly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
